divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS AT HOME AND LOOKING AT THE SUNSET WHEN I FIRST SAW IT. I AM ALWAYS LOOKING AT THE STARS. WHEN I SAW A BRIGHT OBJECT IN THE WEST AT 45deg IT WAS WHITE THEN RED. MY HUSBAND AND DAUGHER SAW IT. WE ARE ALWAYS LOOKING AT THE STARS AND I DON'T THINK THIS WAS A STAR. I WAS LOOKING AT IT WITH BINOCULARS FOR 15 MINUTES AND I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT WAS.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around March 8th 2010
